meanings.definition: A thin, crisp, disc-shaped Indian bread typically made from lentil or chickpea flour.
meanings.sent1: The restaurant served delicious poppadoms with curry.
meanings.sent2: I love the crunchy texture of poppadoms with my meal.
meanings.sent3: The poppadoms danced on the plate, tempting me to take a bite.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was as light and crispy as a poppadom.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of freshly fried poppadoms filled the room.

meanings.definition: A popular Indian snack or appetizer served with chutney or other condiments.
meanings.sent1: We ordered a variety of poppadoms to share with friends.
meanings.sent2: The poppadoms disappeared quickly at the party.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous poppadoms rolled off the table and onto the floor.
meanings.sent4: His jokes were as addictive as poppadoms at a gathering.
meanings.sent5: The colorful chutneys paired perfectly with the crispy poppadoms.
